text.div:
This code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/omhtofhir/CodeSystem/omh-device-modality defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
sensed SensedDevice measurement is sensed directly by the device
self-reported Self ReportedDevice measurement is entered by the user

name: omh-device-modality
title: Open mHealth to FHIR Device Modality
description: Identifies whether device measurement is sensed directly or entered by the user

concept.definition: Device measurement is sensed directly by the device
Device measurement is entered by the user
